00041 typedef enum mongo_error_t {
00042     MONGO_CONN_SUCCESS = 0,  
00043     MONGO_CONN_NO_SOCKET,    
00044     MONGO_CONN_FAIL,         
00045     MONGO_CONN_ADDR_FAIL,    
00046     MONGO_CONN_NOT_MASTER,   
00047     MONGO_CONN_BAD_SET_NAME, 
00048     MONGO_CONN_NO_PRIMARY,   
00050     MONGO_IO_ERROR,

00053     MONGO_COMMAND_FAILED,    
00054     MONGO_NS_INVALID,        
00055     MONGO_BSON_INVALID,      
00056     MONGO_BSON_NOT_FINISHED, 
00057     MONGO_BSON_TOO_LARGE

00108 typedef struct {
00109     int len;
00110     int id;
00111     int responseTo;
00112     int op;
00113 } mongo_header;

00115 typedef struct {
00116     mongo_header head;

00118 } mongo_message;

00120 typedef struct {
00121     int flag; /* FIX THIS COMMENT non-zero on failure */
00122     int64_t cursorID;
00123     int start;
00124     int num;
00125 } mongo_reply_fields;
00126 
00127 typedef struct {
00128     mongo_header head;
00129     mongo_reply_fields fields;
00130     char objs;
00131 } mongo_reply;

00134 typedef struct mongo_host_port {
00135     char host[255];
00136     int port;
00137     struct mongo_host_port *next;
00138 } mongo_host_port;
00139 
00140 typedef struct {
00141     mongo_host_port *seeds;        
00142     mongo_host_port *hosts;        
00143     char *name;                    
00144     bson_bool_t primary_connected; 
00145 } mongo_replset;

00147 typedef struct mongo {
00148     mongo_host_port *primary;  
00149     mongo_replset *replset;    
00150     int sock;                  
00151     int flags;                 
00152     int conn_timeout_ms;       
00153     int op_timeout_ms;         
00154     int max_bson_size;         
00155     bson_bool_t connected;     
00157     mongo_error_t err;          
00158     int errcode;                
00159     char errstr[MONGO_ERR_LEN]; 
00160     int lasterrcode;            
00161     char lasterrstr[MONGO_ERR_LEN]; 
00162 } mongo;

00164 typedef struct {
00165     mongo_reply *reply;  
00166     mongo *conn;       
00167     const char *ns;    
00168     int flags;         
00169     int seen;

00172     const bson *query;

00174     int options;       
00175     int limit;         
00176     int skip;          
00177 } mongo_cursor;
